response.overview: A bounty hunter pursues a former Mafia accountant who embezzled $15 million of mob money. He is also being chased by a rival bounty hunter, the F.B.I., and his old mob boss after jumping bail.
response.tagline: This could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
response.title: Midnight Run
